name: Souls Connected
description:
Made for the Lost Relic Games Game Jam

Instructions on how to play are in the Level select screen.

All assets made by me during the jam besides the music and sound which were found on Opengameart.org by the following people:

Jump Sound Blender Foundation

Title music el-corleo

BGM syncopika

Shrink sounds pauliuw

Only has 2 levels as didn't have as much free time as I had hoped.

The blue soul is unable to jump but can shrink to get through small spaces.

The pink soul is able to jump over obstacles.

Certain point let each character use the ability of the other.

Guide each soul to each other to beat the level.
